name: THE KING IS AN IDIOT!
description:
a tower defence game

The king is an idiot!

He refuses to let you take control where buildings are going to be placed, and a massive tank is coming to crush the entire castle!

help move the randomly placed troops away from hazardous buildings the king places, and stop the tank with minimal damages!

Arrow keys - place redirector at mouse - redirectors change the direction of moving troops

LMB - remove redirector

Click the dice to spawn a building, given you have enough gold.

Dev Note: Sorry the tank, landscape and castle look so crude, Unfortunately I never managed to polish that up in time. Make sure to leave a review though!
